template_input_params.name: snapshot_identifier
template_input_params.label: ID of an existing snapshot to create this database from.
template_input_params.description: Snapshot ID to create the new database from. You must either provide this value or to create a fresh database provide values for Allocated Storage,  Database engine, Master DB user name and Master DB user password

template_input_params.name: allocated_storage
template_input_params.label: Allocated Storage (in gibibytes - required unless a snapshot identifier is provided)
template_input_params.description: The allocated storage in gibibytes. Required unless a snapshot identifier is provided.

template_input_params.name: db_engine
template_input_params.label: Database engine (required unless a snapshot identifier is provided)
template_input_params.description: The database engine to use. Required unless a snapshot identifier is provided. If provided with snaphsot identifier, then this value must match the snapshot engine name.

template_input_params.name: engine_version
template_input_params.label: Database engine version
template_input_params.description: The database engine version to use.

template_input_params.name: instance_class
template_input_params.label: Ralational Data Service instance type
template_input_params.description: The instance type of the RDS instance.

template_input_params.name: instance_name
template_input_params.label: Database name
template_input_params.description: The name of the database to create when the DB instance is created. This value is also used as prefix for RDS instance unique identifier.
template_input_params.regexdesc: Must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.

template_input_params.name: username
template_input_params.label: Master DB user name (required unless a snapshot identifier is provided)
template_input_params.description: User name for the master DB. Required unless a snapshot identifier is provided.
template_input_params.regexdesc: Must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters. Maximum length is 16 characters.

template_input_params.name: password
template_input_params.label: Master DB user password (required unless a snapshot identifier is provided)
template_input_params.description: Password for the master DB user. Required unless a snapshot identifier is provided.
template_input_params.regexdesc: At least 8 ASCII characters. Can't contain any of the following: forward slash, single quote, double quote and @.

template_input_params.name: publicly_accessible
template_input_params.label: Is publicly accessible
template_input_params.description: Bool to control if instance is publicly accessible.

template_input_params.name: final_snapshot_identifier
template_input_params.label: Name of DB snapshot when this DB instance is deleted (Required if Skip snapshot on delete set to false)
template_input_params.description: The name of your final DB snapshot when this DB instance is deleted. Must be provided if skip_final_snapshot is set to false.
template_input_params.regexdesc: Only alphanumeric characters and hyphens allowed. First character must be a letter. Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens.

template_input_params.name: skip_final_snapshot
template_input_params.label: Skip snapshot when DB instance is deleted

template_input_params.name: subnet_group_name
template_input_params.label: Name of DB subnet group
template_input_params.description: DB instance will be created in the VPC associated with the DB subnet group. If unspecified, will be created in the default VPC, or in EC2 Classic, if available.

template_input_params.name: vpc_security_group_ids
template_input_params.label: VPC security groups to associate
template_input_params.description: List of VPC security groups to associate with RDS.

template_input_params.name: license_model
template_input_params.label: License Model (required for some DB like Oracle SE)
template_input_params.description: License model information for this DB instance.

template_output_params.name: aws_db_instance_endpoint
template_output_params.label: Connection endpoint
template_output_params.description: The connection endpoint in address:port format.
